overview:
Since 1999 DPM Creative Group has worked with hundreds of Australian artists, galleries and other arts industry bodies helping them produce quality design, web and print collateral. Being involved in the arts over the years means we’re very much aware of budget restraints that artists and galleries face and have developed ways to improve productivity and in turn lower costs. We still print the humble business card on a regular basis and challenge anyway to beat us for quality and price!

Over time our skills have grown to include web development, art direction, photography, marketing and SEO. First and foremost however we are a design agency with a group of very talented designers who’s skills extend from basic art workers and typesetters through to illustrators of the highest order. As passionate designers we have always taken it upon ourselves to take responsibility for the finished product and as such invested time and money in developing a seamless relationship with a Sydney based print facility of which we own a share and so also consider ourselves a print company. Being a strong design agency with the disposal of a print facility if a very powerful thing.

In addition to our passion for quality print and design that ‘works’, we have maintained above all else a passion for the arts and a simple and user friendly approach that all our clients find refreshing and honest. We never take ourselves too seriously and always welcome a challenge.

We’re very proud of our portfolio and feel it speaks for itself. We offer anyone who is interested in working with us an opportunity to receive a sample pack of our work. Please contact the studio or visit our online portfolio on our website. http://www.dpm.net.au/folio.php
